panels.panelBannerText: Browse our favorite photos of the two most handsome dogs in the world.
Biggest heart ever. Barely fits inside his dog body, but he makes it work. 10/10 makes your day better with a lick.
Fiery, passionate, happy to be alive. All phrases we've heard to describe this little bugger.
If you're Brigid, you can use your pass-key to upload new photos of the little babies.
